name: The Space Between Us (Kawpuccino)
description:
The Space Between Us

A (3 week) Multiplayer Game Project by:
Mavis Wong
Iris Chen
Shensi Wang
Seth Khaw

Game Summary

The Space Between Us is a 2 player co-op puzzle game where players can step into the shoes of 2 different alien characters, on their journey through various planets to find a suitable planet to call home.

Their former planet GD-03, is filled with toxins and has been deemed uninhabitable due to a massive catastrophy, so the 2 aliens have escaped to survive. However, because of their differences, these aliens do not always see eye to eye and struggle to work together.

The aim of the game is to encourage healthy collaborative habits between any relationships to overcome game puzzles. To bridge the gaps between the platforms, our alien characters get closer to their objective, and in turn, closer to each other.
Help them overcome their differences and find a new home!

To see full credits for all assets in the game, visit the in-game credits page. This game project is under Fair Use Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act. All art assets were adapted from sources to fit the art style/theme of the game and do not reflect the final product.
